Need to find the magnitude and direction of the current \(I_1\) in the rod.

Rod cd is along the x-axis, suspended horizontally by two insulating strings.
Magnetic field \(B_1\) is along the negative z-axis, pointing downwards.
Magnetic force must balance the weight of the rod since tension is zero.

Using right-hand rule, force should be upwards along the y-axis to balance weight.
Setting magnetic force equal to weight: \(B I L = m g\).
